title: Shanghai Vegetarian Foods - Fumin Rd
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Chinese, Buffet, Salad bar, Take-out, Taiwanese
description: 上海素食百匯自助餐, located at 高雄市左營區富民路108號, is a veggie buffet. You see the chefs cooking, and there are signs noting whether a dish contains egg or milk. Meal is weighed and also comes with soup and lemonade or fruit tea. Consider bringing your own bowl and chopsticks as the restaurant gives you only paper plates. Best to arrive at 12pm for lunch or 5pm for dinner.
